statements: SELECT donor_id, donation_amount, donation_date, acknowledgement_sent FROM donation_receipts WHERE donor_id = 1;
SELECT donation_amount, donor_id, acknowledgement_sent, donation_date FROM donation_receipts WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM donation_receipts WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_id, donation_amount FROM donation_receipts WHERE acknowledgement_sent = true ORDER BY donation_date ASC;
SELECT donation_date, donor_id FROM donation_receipts ORDER BY donor_id, donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_id, donation_amount, donation_date, acknowledgement_sent FROM donation_receipts WHERE donor_id = 1234;
SELECT donor_id, donation_amount FROM donation_receipts WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM donation_receipts WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND acknowledgement_sent = 0;
SELECT donor_id, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donation FROM donation_receipts GROUP BY donor_id HAVING total_donation > 5000 ORDER BY total_donation DESC;
SELECT donation_date, COUNT(*) AS total_donations FROM donation_receipts GROUP BY donation_date ORDER BY total_donations DESC;
SELECT * FROM donators;
SELECT donator_name, donation_amount FROM donators ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT donator_name, donation_amount FROM donators WHERE donation_amount > 100 ORDER BY donation_amount;
SELECT donator_name, donation_amount FROM donators WHERE donator_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT donator_name, donation_amount FROM donators WHERE donation_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY donation_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM donators WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donator_id DESC;
SELECT donator_name, donation_amount FROM donators WHERE donation_amount < 500 ORDER BY donation_amount ASC;
SELECT donator_name, donator_email, donation_amount FROM donators WHERE donation_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY donator_name ASC;
SELECT donator_name, receipt_amount, donation_date FROM donators JOIN receipts ON donators.donator_id = receipts.donator_id WHERE donation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donator_name, receipt_amount, acknowledgment_sent FROM donators JOIN receipts ON donators.donator_id = receipts.donator_id WHERE acknowledgment_sent = TRUE ORDER BY donator_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM donation;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donation ORDER BY donation_id DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donation WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donation WHERE donor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM receipt JOIN donation ON receipt.donation_id = donation.donation_id;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donation ORDER BY donation_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT receipt_id, total_amount_received, receipt_date FROM receipt WHERE total_amount_received > 1000 ORDER BY receipt_date ASC;

SELECT donation.donor_name, receipt.total_amount_received FROM donation INNER JOIN receipt ON donation.donation_id = receipt.donation_id WHERE donation.donor_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY donation.donor_name;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donation WHERE donation_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY donor_name ASC;

SELECT donation.donor_name, acknowledgment_letter.recipient_name, acknowledgment_letter.ack_date FROM donation INNER JOIN acknowledgment_letter ON donation.donation_id = acknowledgment_letter.donation_id ORDER BY acknowledgment_letter.ack_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Donation;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM Donation ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM Donation WHERE donor_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM Donation ORDER BY donation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM Donation WHERE donation_amount > 100 ORDER BY donation_date;
SELECT * FROM Donation ORDER BY donation_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM Donation WHERE donation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY donation_amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT receipt_id, receipt_date FROM Receipt WHERE receipt_generated = TRUE ORDER BY receipt_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT d.donor_name, a.letter_date FROM Donor d JOIN AcknowledgmentLetter a ON d.donor_id = a.donor_id WHERE a.acknowledgment_sent = FALSE ORDER BY a.letter_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT r.receipt_id, d.donor_name, r.receipt_date FROM Receipt r JOIN Donation d ON r.donation_id = d.donation_id ORDER BY r.receipt_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations
SELECT donor_name, donor_email, donor_address FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 1
SELECT * FROM acknowledgments ORDER BY acknowledgment_date DESC
SELECT trigger_name, trigger_event FROM triggers WHERE trigger_event = 'Insert'
SELECT donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 100 ORDER BY donation_date ASC
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 500 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email, donor_address FROM donors WHERE donor_email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY donor_name ASC;
SELECT acknowledgment_date, acknowledgment_message FROM acknowledgments WHERE acknowledgment_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY acknowledgment_date DESC;
SELECT procedure_name, procedure_description FROM procedures WHERE LENGTH(procedure_steps) > 100 ORDER BY procedure_name ASC;
SELECT trigger_name, trigger_event, trigger_action FROM triggers WHERE LENGTH(trigger_action) > 20 ORDER BY trigger_name DESC;
